forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow. Snow will be heavy at times this morning. High 1C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow. Snow will be heavy at times this morning. High 37F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 27F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the morning. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow will become heavy at times overnight. Low -4C. NNE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow will become heavy at times overnight. Low 27F. NE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow...heavy at times. High 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy snow. High 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the evening, otherwise a good deal of clouds. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the evening, otherwise a good deal of clouds. Low 18F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 15F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 43F. Winds light and variable.
